task.summary: Default task
View now follows the hero. Bug fixed: when you collect all orbs hero sprite doesn't disappear anymore Bug fixed: now spells disappear in the right way Added Weapon drop with 33% chance
Added Text. Bug fix: Chest containing orbs now work correctly.
Now hero cannot spam physical attacks
Now Enemies chase you if you hit them, and if they are witches have 1/50 chance per frame of shooting fireballs at you.
Fixed: now your fireballs don't travel trough walls.
Now matchWeapon method is in Weapon class.
Added LevelDrawer. Now textures are not loaded in the main anymore.
Added Character selection screen. Fixed Weapon sprite.
Added name selection screen. Added medieval font for customizing screens.
Fixed chest colors. now enemy text displays HP correctly.
Fixed chest bug. Updated sfml commands.
Fixed view and resolution screen.
Added character and weapon factories.
Fixed resolution in main.
Fixed: now enemy spells will pass trough walls never again. Fixed: now Thief doesn't compenetrate walls when moving at double speed. Added: Strategy method for AI.
Added: now map are loaded with a text file! Adjusted some positions in order to fit into the new map.
Fixed: now upper folder is the working directory.
Added: White rect in character selection.
Now you can set different type of walls depending on the char map. Now breakable walls are kind of transparent.
Now levelDrawer is a source file.
Changed Knigth and Sword with Warrior and Axe
Added: Hero Sprites!! Added: Music in the menu!!
Added: enemy sprites.
Added: BGM
